title: Membership
description: Become a part of the our Community and unlock a world of creativity. As a member, you'll have the opportunity to learn, discover, and share your passion..

title: Wheel Workshop
description: beginner-friendly wheel workshop focuses on teaching you the basic techniques for working with clay on a pottery wheel. Let your pieces dry & then return after 2 weeks for glazing them (coloring).

title: Kids - Classs
description: engaging and educational workshop designed for children to introduce young participants to the basics of hand building in a fun and interactive way. Let your pieces dry & then return after 2 weeks for glazing them (coloring)

title: Painting  - class
description: unlock your inner artist, express you creativity as you paint your own pottery piece, where you can choose any ready-made pottery piece (vas, jar, tray,mubkhar,etc) and let your inspiration flow.

title: Private Workshop Package
description: Whether you're looking to celebrate a milestone birthday, an anniversary, or simply a treat with your friends, celebrate your special event by joining our hand-built pottery workshop. Where you will be guided to design and create your own unique, handmade ceramic piece. This intimate workshop provides a fun and creative way to mark your occasion.
